Name: DARK SOULS™ III
About the game: We are currently in the process of restoring the online servers for the DARK SOULS series on PC. We plan to restore online service for each game progressively, bringing back servers for DARK SOULS™ III once we complete the necessary work to correct the problem. We will provide additional updates as soon as the restoration schedule is finalized. We want to thank all our players for your patience and understanding as we work to fix this issue. Get the DARK SOULS™ III Season Pass now and challenge yourself with all the available content! Winner of gamescom award 2015 'Best RPG' and over 35 E3 2015 Awards and Nominations. DARK SOULS™ III continues to push the boundaries with the latest, ambitious chapter in the critically-acclaimed and genre-defining series. As fires fade and the world falls into ruin, journey into a universe filled with more colossal enemies and environments. Players will be immersed into a world of epic atmosphere and darkness through faster gameplay and amplified combat intensity. Fans and newcomers alike will get lost in the game hallmark rewarding gameplay and immersive graphics. Now only embers remain… Prepare yourself once more and Embrace The Darkness!
